meanings.sent2: He frequently forgets his keys at home.
meanings.sent3: The cat frequently pretends to be a ninja.
meanings.sent4: His jokes land frequently like a falling star.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter fills the room frequently.

meanings.definition: Occurring or appearing at short intervals
meanings.sent1: The frequently changing weather keeps us on our toes.
meanings.sent2: The frequently updated app always has new features.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's frequently stolen acorns were found in the bird's nest.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a frequently shifting puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The frequently flickering light cast eerie shadows.
